step.datasource: SELECT DISTINCT do.[OrderNr] ,r.regel as [RowNr] ,do.debnr as [DebtorNr] ,do.ord_debtor_name as [Name] ,do.docnumber AS [SODescription] ,r.artcode as [Itemcode] ,r.oms45 as [ItemDescription] ,r.esr_aantal as [Quantity] ,CASE WHEN CONVERT(varchar, r.afldat, 103) LIKE '%2099%' THEN 'T.B.A' ELSE CONVERT(varchar, r.afldat, 103) END AS [DeliveryDate] ,LOWER(LTRIM(RTRIM(do.ord_contactemail))) AS [EmailAddress] ,ia.ItemCodeAccount ,h.mail as AccountManager from orkrg do with (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN orsrg r WITH (NOLOCK) ON r.orderNr = do.ordernr inner join cicmpy c with (NOLOCK) on do.debnr = c.debnr left join ItemAccounts ia with (NOLOCK) on ia.AccountCode = c.cmp_wwn and ia.ItemCode = r.artcode LEFT JOIN [483]..orkrg io with (NOLOCK) on io.ordernr = RIGHT(do.docnumber, 8) COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT left join [orlaco]..humres h with (NOLOCK) on h.res_id = c.cmp_acc_man where 1=1 AND do.ord_contactemail IS NOT NULL AND r.pakbon_afg = 0 and r.ar_soort <> 'P' AND r.ar_soort <> 'T' and do.afgehandld = 0 AND uitgifte = 0 AND io.ordernr is null AND do.debnr NOT IN ( '999832', '969242', '969240', '969241', '973335', '305030', '304326', '501095', '974220', '966137', '999832', '120720', '120710', '040447', '973422', '973371', '999180', '973276', '973793', '303284', '999634', '305507', '999110', '304304', '974659', '973752', '140555', '305535', '303626', '500841', '303776', '501086', '965976', '966949', '965975', '969118', '967905', '974162', '500307', '501142', '302953', '997242', '967420', '973749', '999149', '973578', '140510', '140570', '190200', '190201', '190202', '190204', '974645', '973894', '974702', '972173', '965729', '030740', '030741', '975162', '500409', '967065', '973428', '973496', '967177', '967956', '304342', '970795', '972932', '967429', '968528', '998223', '974177', '966106', '304179', '999559', '973498', '973066', '999261', '973451', '967362', '998876', '973137', '304341', '230465', '975374', '999844', '040446', '040448' ) AND do.SelCode IN ('1','83') AND r.afldat >= GETDATE() AND do.ord_soort = 'V' GROUP BY do.[OrderNr] ,do.debnr ,do.ord_debtor_name ,do.docnumber ,r.regel ,CONVERT(varchar,r.afldat,103) ,r.artcode ,r.oms45 ,r.esr_aantal ,do.ord_contactemail ,ia.ItemCodeAccount ,h.mail ORDER BY DebtorNR, EmailAddress, OrderNr, RowNr
step.contentbody:
To: %Name% - %EmailAddress%

Dear customer

Stoneridge Orlaco considers it important to keep you informed of the current planned delivery dates of your open orders, so that you are informed in good time when a delivery can be expected. In the overview below you will find the current overview with the planned deliveries per order.

If you have any questions about this, please contact the Global Customer Support Team at support.netherlands@stoneridge.com
Order numberYour ReferenceItemcode Your ItemcodeDescriptionQuantity Expected Shipment Date
%OrderNr%%SODescription%%Itemcode%%ItemCodeAccount% %ItemDescription%%Quantity%%DeliveryDate%
 

Best regards,

Global Customer Support Team
Stoneridge | ORLACO – Vision is our mission®

step.datasource: SELECT DISTINCT do.[OrderNr] ,r.regel as [RowNr] ,do.debnr as [DebtorNr] ,do.ord_debtor_name as [Name] ,do.docnumber AS [SODescription] ,r.artcode as [Itemcode] ,r.oms45 as [ItemDescription] ,r.esr_aantal as [Quantity] ,CASE WHEN CONVERT(varchar, r.afldat, 103) LIKE '%2099%' THEN 'T.B.A' ELSE CONVERT(varchar, r.afldat, 103) END AS [DeliveryDate] ,LOWER(LTRIM(RTRIM(do.ord_contactemail))) AS [EmailAddress] ,ia.ItemCodeAccount ,h.mail as AccountManager from orkrg do with (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN orsrg r WITH (NOLOCK) ON r.orderNr = do.ordernr inner h.res_id = c.cmp_acc_man where 1=1 AND do.ord_contactemail IS NOT NULL AND r.pakbon_afg = 0 and r.ar_soort <> 'P' AND r.ar_soort <> 'T' and do.afgehandld = 0 AND uitgifte = 0 AND do.debnr NOT IN ( '999832', '969242', '969240', '969241', '973335', '305030', '304326', '501095', '974220', '966137', '999832', '120720', '120710', '040447', '973422', '973371', '999180', '973276', '973793', '303284', '999634', '305507', '999110', '304304', '974659', '973752', '140555', '305535', '303626', '500841', '303776', '501086', '965976', '966949', '965975', '969118', '967905', '974162', '500307', '501142', '302953', '997242', '967420', '973749', '999149', '973578', '140510', '140570', '190200', '190201', '190202', '190204', '974645', '973894', '974702', '972173', '965729', '030740', '030741', '975162', '500409', '967065', '973428', '973496', '967177', '967956', '304342', '970795', '972932', '967429', '968528', '998223', '974177', '966106', '304179', '999559', '973498', '973066', '999261', '973451', '967362', '998876', '973137', '304341', '230465', '975374', '999844', '040446', '040448' ) AND do.SelCode IN ('1','83') AND r.afldat >= GETDATE() AND do.ord_soort = 'V' GROUP BY do.[OrderNr] ,do.debnr ,do.ord_debtor_name ,do.docnumber ,r.regel ,CONVERT(varchar,r.afldat,103) ,r.artcode ,r.oms45 ,r.esr_aantal ,do.ord_contactemail ,ia.ItemCodeAccount ,h.mail ORDER BY DebtorNR, EmailAddress, OrderNr, RowNr
step.contentbody:
To: %Name% - %EmailAddress%

Dear customer

Stoneridge Orlaco considers it important to keep you informed of the current planned delivery dates of your open orders, so that you are informed in good time when a delivery can be expected. In the overview below you will find the current overview with the planned deliveries per order.

If you have any questions about this, please contact the Global Customer Support Team at support.netherlands@stoneridge.com
Order numberYour ReferenceItemcode Your ItemcodeDescriptionQuantity Expected Shipment Date

Best regards,

Global Customer Support Team
Stoneridge | ORLACO – Vision is our mission®

'302953', '997242', '967420', '973749', '999149', '973578', '140510', '140570', '190200', '190201', '190202', '190204', '974645', '973894', '974702', '972173', '965729', '030740', '030741', '975162',
